com.kroy.game

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kroy.game.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fortress, Patrol

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Character class used as a base class for all moveable objects in the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        protected Character(int health,
                    int damage,
                    int range,
                    Tile spawn,
                    java.lang.String spriteTex)
        Constructs a Character object which is an entity that can shoot, move and be killed. Extends from Sprite to allow rendering capability Character is abstract and must be constructed via a child
        Parameters:
        health - the starting health of the character
        damage - the amount of damage this deals
        range - how far from its location it can shoot
        spawn - the starting location of this character
        spriteTex - the image that the sprite class is loaded with
